forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon emerges with a bright, sunlit clarity, tempered only by a light marine breeze flowing gently from the west. Temperatures hover near a crisp 62 degrees, providing a refreshing ambiance, making it a delightful time to be outdoors. As the sun arcs across the sky, the warmth beckons while wispy clouds hint at the cool embrace of evening, expected to settle in as the night approaches. There’s a slight haziness that suggests the presence of fog lingering in the distance, yet the towering skyline remains a prominent feature, undiminished by any shroud.

As dusk approaches, anticipate a shift to mostly cloudy skies and a subtle descent into cooler temperatures around 53 degrees. With the gentle winds calming to a whisper, dressing in layers would be prudent, perhaps a light jacket to fend off the evening chill. The ambiance remains inviting, encouraging leisurely pursuits—a stroll along the waterfront could unveil the shimmering reflections of city lights as day dissolves into night. Alternatively, a visit to a cozy café offers warmth and solace, perfect for unwinding with a good book or savoring a rich cup of coffee as the ambiance of the city transforms under the quiet embrace of twilight.
